title: When using firefox, my internet is extremely slow, but when using another browser, it is fast. what can I do to fix this?
creator: raspikes

title: FF WIN 11 latest install 2023-09-10 always resets zoom to 100.
content:
I see no way to set the system-wide default zoom to 70% as each time I do so and reboot, it is reset to 100%

This is, sadly, extremely frustrating after 3 decades of happily using FF.

Brave does it right.

With all respect, why not FF?

Your thoughts, please.
creator: Chuck888

title: firefox tabs remain open in task manager
content: I close tabs but my task manager shows they remain open.
creator: m.j.rozelle

title: Firefox quit working on my machine
content:
All of a sudden Firefox won't load. I get this message ...

"Firefox is already running, but is not responding. The old Firefox process must be closed to open a new window."

There is no other window open and I still get this message. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it and I still get this message when the program won't load.

Help!

Bil. Alvernaz bil@alvernaz.com
creator: bil3

title: Not getting email conformation codes
content:
I lost my authenticator app and am having to redo all of them. Since I don't have it, I had Firefox send me a conformation email so I could access my account. But they never came even after I waited and tried again. 

checked both on my mail app and on the web like the support page suggested.  I also added "accounts@firefox.com" to my whitelist and checked my spam folder.

I am logged in to the app on my phone. But that too requires me to authenticate to access account settings. Also, I am pretty sure I have my phone number added - but have not been given that option.

Any help would be great.
creator: mr.brosnahan
